abstract.t: This document defines the TLS mapping for scalability protocols.

section.title: Underlying protocol
section.t: This mapping should be layered directly on the top of TLS.
All the details of the protocol are the same as with TCP mapping for SP -- see sp-tcp-mapping I-D.

section.title: IANA Considerations
section.t: This memo includes no request to IANA.

section.title: Security Considerations
section.t: The mapping isn't intended to provide any additional security in addition to what TLS does.
